list_definition.definition: a mark made by folding or doubling something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a smart crease in his trousers
My dress was full of creases after being in my suitcase.

list_definition.mean_english: vạch trắng ở hai đầu sân
list_definition.definition: in cricket, a line showing the position of the batsman or bowler

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The opening batsman walked up to the crease.
